title: Fragment, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) on satin ground
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of deep wine-colored cut and uncut velvet on self-colored satin ground. Large-scale symmetrical floral motif with two large blossoms on curved stems at the bottom of the piece.
